p: Inhibition of cell migration and metastasis was evaluated by wound healing assay [ 44]. HeLa cells were seeded in 24 well plates. After 24 h, cells were treated with concentration values of IC 50 of the different plant extracts obtained from the MTT assay and 0.1% DMSO (solvent control) for 2 h in serum-free medium. A scratch was made with a 200 µl pipette tip. Cells were then washed twice with ice-cold PBS (pH 7.4) and fresh medium was added. Wound closure was observed immediately (0 h) using an inverted microscope (CKX53, Olympus) and at different time intervals (24 h and 36 h). Cell migration and percentage wound healing were also calculated using Sketch and CalcTM ® along with Gimp2.10.10 ® software measuring the distance between wound closures. The experiment was independently performed in triplicates.
